name: Cat Petter
description:
Cat petter is a cockie clicker style game made during the Gift Jam of 2018 as a gift for LadyOfIris. In it you have to pet cats in order to upload your pets to the internet and get internet points, wich you can use to buy upgrades and pet more cats. Check the hour of the day before uploading a video so you can get more internet points using a high traffic hour. 

An don't forget to feed your cats.
